aethelion.name: Aethelion
aethelion.title: God of Good & Justice
aethelion.description: The ultimate protector against the Void. His followers are paladins and guardians.

sentis.name: Sentis
sentis.title: The Watcher
sentis.description: The ever-watchful eye. Grants wards of alarm and guarding.

thoran.name: Thoran
thoran.title: The Loyal Fury
thoran.description: Protects others through physical might and shielding.

aerina.name: Aerina
aerina.title: The Silver Shield
aerina.description: Weaves magical wards for the elven people.

verrona.name: Verrona
verrona.title: The Hearthmother
verrona.description: Protects the home and family from harm.

elora.name: Elora
elora.title: The Dove
elora.description: Specializes in Sanctuary spells and preventing violence.

morthos.name: Morthos
morthos.title: Judge of the Damned
morthos.description: Protects against undeath and seals souls to their fate.

avron.name: Avron
avron.title: The Little Defender
avron.description: Uses small but mighty magical defenses to protect the weak.
